name: Happy Differences - Find them
description:
Travel across the world. Spot differences in pictures. Compete with other players and win tournaments.

Focus on the details and train your brain!
How many differences can you find? Take the challenge now!

Features:
· Compare two pictures to find all the difference
· Participate in amazing events!
· More than 10 000 high quality pictures
· Spot the different object and tap on it
· Try to find all differences in time
· Use hints if you need a clue

Contact tech support at support@eidoloncorp.com·

Have fun and enjoy the game!
